description: This file defines API routes for Jira integration within a FastAPI application, providing endpoints to fetch individual Jira issues and perform Jira issue searches with proper dependency management and error handling.

methods.name: search_issues( payload: JiraSearchRequest, client: JiraClient = Depends(get_client), _: None = Depends(get_auth_dependency(get_settings())), )
methods.description: API endpoint to search Jira issues using JQL.
